name: You are Never Alone
description: A horror maze game with the purpose to escape. Lost in a maze that is oddly familiar, you must remember how to escape without them finding you. Avoid "them" while you collect your memories to get out without being followed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Storage: 3 GB available space
